title.narrative: Contribute to strengthen the capacities of resilience of communities in crisis

description.narrative: Oxfam is aiming to provide an integrated humanitarian, recovery and resilience response to vulnerable populations in Sikasso, Kayes, Mopti, Tombouctou, Gao, Menaka and Kidal. Our plan is to reach more than 200,000 persons with direct assistance by providing services and goods regarding food security and livelihoods, Water Sanitation and Hygiene and Protection.

participating-org.narrative: USAID - Bureau for Hum Ass (ex OFDA)

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY
